briefTitle: A Study of Adalimumab After Dose Escalation in Japanese Subjects With Crohn's Disease
officialTitle: A Multicenter Open-label Study of the Human Anti-TNF Monoclonal Antibody Adalimumab to Investigate Efficacy, Safety and Pharmacokinetics After Dose Escalation in Japanese Subjects With Crohn's Disease
summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the efficacy, safety and pharmacokinetics after dose escalation in Japanese subjects with Crohn's Disease.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Clinical Response 50 (CR50; Crohn's Disease Activity Index [CDAI] Decrease â‰¥ 50 From Week 0) at Week 8
